CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper July 20, 1957, pg. A3, reads: "Takes Skill - Raymond Wharton displays his skill in upholstering in his workshop in the basement of City Hall. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Pittsburgh city upholsterer Raymond Wharton hammering bench with City Hall superintendent Martin McTighe standing in background, in basement of City Hall
